duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading the development and implementation of analytics and statistics to improve complaints monitoring, product performance, and compliance of medical devices.
Analyzing customer complaints, events, and post marketing surveillance data for patterns and trends; investigating when necessary.
Communicating product performance to management committees, design teams, and external customers.
Identifying, coordinating, and executing project priorities based on business and department objectives.
Championing and fostering the execution of continuous improvement projects within the local and Global Customer Quality organizations.
Maintaining compliance to the Quality Policy and all other documented quality processes and procedures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in an engineering discipline, data science, or STEM discipline (Master's preferred)
